title: Why Did Mid Lane Varus Get Punished For Bot Varus Being OP?
body:
Dear Riot Balance Team,

Mid Varus used to be my absolute favorite thing to play in League, but the Q changes (20 sec cooldown, etc) have made the build completely inert, even though it was pretty fairy balanced before.

Will the Balance Team ever find a way to make Varus poke builds a thing again, while keeping adc Varus in line? It's really frustrating for one playstyle to be punished because of a knee-jerk reaction to an unfortunate balance move that broke a different playstyle of the same champion.

Sincerely, an Ex-Varus Main

replies.body: Thank God, ADCs need to stay bot, mid should be assasins and mages

Mid Varus played like a poke mage, but dealt physical damage instead of magic

do you even know what you're talking about?
